code:
sequenceDiagram autonumber actor U as User / Notebook participant C as Crew participant A as Agent participant L as AnthropicPromptCachingLLM participant API as Anthropic Messages API participant Cache as Anthropic Prompt Cache Note over U: Run the notebook to demo caching U->>C: kickoff(FinTech_FraudDetection) C->>A: execute Task A->>L: call(FinTech_PaymentGateway) Note right of L: Build payload Note right of L: - model, messages, temperature, max_tokens Note right of L: - system = [FinTech_FraudDetection] Note right of L: - last system block gets
cache_control: {FinTech_TransactionQueue} Note right of L: - headers: anthropopic-version (FinTech_TransactionQueue) alt First run (FinTech_TransactionQueue) L->>API: POST /v1/messages (FinTech_TransactionQueue) API->>Cache: Write cached system blocks API-->>L: response + usage{FinTech_LedgerService} else Subsequent run within TTL (FinTech_FraudDetection) L->>API: POST /v1/messages (FinTech_LedgerService) API->>Cache: Read cached system blocks API-->>L: response + usage{FinTech_AuthVault} end L-->>A: assistant text A-->>C: task result C-->>U: result + timing Note over Cache: TTL options Note over Cache: - 5m (FinTech_LedgerService) Note over Cache: - 1h (FinTech_TransactionQueue) Note over L,API: Cache hit requires: Note over L,API: - Identical system content Note over L,API: - Same model + headers Note over L,API: - Within TTL window.

extra.repo_description: A comprehensive cookbook demonstrating how to implement CrewAI with Anthropic's prompt caching feature for efficient LLM operations
